dcterms:creator: Mohit Iyyer
Wen-tau Yih
Ming-Wei Chang
dcterms:description: The Sequential Question Answering (SQA) dataset consists of sequences of questions that can be answered from a given table. It is designed so that every question can be answered by one or more table cells, containing 6,066 answer sequences with a total of 17,553 questions.
dcterms:title: Sequential Question Answering (SQA) dataset
